description: Just a delicious slice, try stopping at just one piece!
name: Butterscotch Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Base: Preheat Oven to 180 degrees (160 fan forced). Grease and line (with over hang on the sides for ease of lifting out) a slice tray.
Into a large bowl, add dry ingredients and mix to combine. Pour over combined cooled butter, egg and vanilla. Stir to combine.
Press into slice tray and bake for about 20 minutes or until lightly golden.

Topping: Whilst Base is baking. Add topping ingredients into a medium saucepan on low heat, stir to combine then keep stirring until butter has melted and the mixture is well combined and hot. This should take about 4-5 minutes.
Remove base from oven, pour over butterscotch from saucepan, return to oven and bake a further 10-15 minutes or until lightly golden and bubbly. Remove from oven. Top with granulated nuts (optional).
Set aside to cool completely before slicing. Enjoy.
